mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, nickname, phone, role, balance) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{role}, #{balance})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET username = #{username}, password = #{password}, nickname = #{nickname}, phone = #{phone}, role = #{role}, balance = #{balance}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE create_time > #{time}
